page.title: 14Theatre in Ulverston
page.content: { Welfare State International}is a freelance theatre company based in Ulverston. It was founded in 1968. There are only 4 permanent members, but for each show from one to fifty actors,musicians,dancers and others are called in. Welfare State do an extremely varied selection of events: barn dances, indoor shows,outdoor street theatre, workshops,processions,summer schools, films,weddings,childrens naming cerem_ onies,theatrical feasts,carnivals, sculptures and work abroad. Welfare State also try to involve the community in which they are working as much as possible,and many volunteers are involved in its prod- uctions.
